subject: Concussions
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Football
lead_paragraph: Retired players and their beneficiaries can now vote on the deal, which includes a promise from the N.F.L. to pay an unlimited amount of awards to players with certain neurological conditions.
snippet: Retired players and their beneficiaries can now vote on the deal, which includes a promise from the N.F.L. to pay an unlimited amount of awards to players with certain neurological conditions.
